TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PanelStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

span.span: Represents the style for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示在面板控件的样式设置。The class is used to represent the style settings for a panel control. 它封装控件面板的外观并可以应用于多个面板控件，以提供通用外观的属性。It encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a panel and can be applied to multiple panel controls to provide a common appearance. 可以指定要通过设置面板的背景中显示的图像属性。You can specify an image to display in the background of the panel by setting the property. 面板内容的水平对齐方式由属性。The horizontal alignment of the contents of the panel is indicated by the property. 可以通过设置指定包含在面板控件的文本的控件的方向属性。The direction of controls that contain text within the panel control can be specified by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对象并设置其属性。The following code example demonstrates creating a object and setting its properties. 此示例包含两个部分：This example has two parts: 分部类中， `PanelStylecs_aspx`，演示如何创建一个新对象并设置其属性。A partial class, `PanelStylecs_aspx`, that demonstrates creating a new object and setting its properties. 使用 Web 窗体页`PanelStylecs_aspx`其代码隐藏文件的示例。A Web Forms page that uses the `PanelStylecs_aspx` example as its code-behind file. 该示例的第一部分演示如何创建对象， `myPanelStyle`，并设置其属性。The first part of the example demonstrates creating a object, `myPanelStyle`, and setting its properties. 然后方法调用两个`Panel1`面板和`Panel2`面板中，和`myPanelStyle`应用于这两个值。Then the method is called for both the `Panel1` panel and the `Panel2` panel, and `myPanelStyle` is applied to both of them. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分显示与前面的示例使用的.aspx 文件。The second part of the example shows an .aspx file that is used with the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置面板控件背景图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the background image for the panel control.

value.span: 面板控件背景图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the background image for the panel control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的面板控件的背景图像的 URL。The property specifies the URL of the background image for the panel control. 对于此属性工作，图像文件必须位于指定位置。For this property to work, an image file must exist at the specified location. 如果指定的图像文件不可访问，则没有背景图像显示面板控件。If the specified image file is not accessible, then the panel control is displayed without a background image. ## Examples 下面的代码示例适用于两个面板控件，相同的背景图像`Panel1`和`Panel2`。The following code example applies the same background image to two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须提供你自己的映像。For this example to work correctly, you must provide your own image. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

span.span: Duplicates the style properties of the specified object for the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法复制指定的样式设置对象的当前实例类。You can use the method to duplicate the style settings of the specified object for the current instance of the class. 方法将从指定的非空白元素对象， `s`。The method copies non-blank elements from the specified object, `s`. 在中定义的任何元素`s`替换中定义任何元素对象。Any element that is defined in `s` replaces any element that is defined in the object. 若要将这些中保留为空白的样式设置为对象，请使用方法。To replace only those style settings left blank in the object, use the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置在面板控件中显示包含文本的控件的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which to display controls that include text in a panel control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定要在其中显示在面板控件中包含文本的控件的方向。The property specifies the direction in which to display controls that include text in a panel control. 属性使用其中一个设置值。The property is set using one of the values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置内容的方向。The content direction is not set.| |`LeftToRight`|从左向右显示包含文本的子控件。Child controls that include text are displayed from left to right.| |`RightToLeft`|从右到左显示包含文本的子控件。Child controls that include text are displayed from right to left.| 如果指定，包括文本的子控件将显示从左到右。If you specify , child controls that include text display from left to right. 如果指定，包含文本的子控件从右到左显示。If you specify , child controls that include text display right to left. 使用要显示的语言编写从右到左，例如阿拉伯语或希伯来语的文本。Use to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic or Hebrew. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置两个面板控件的属性`Panel1`并`Panel2`到`ContentDirection.LeftToRight`枚举值。The following code example sets the properties of two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`, to the `ContentDirection.LeftToRight` enumeration value. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

exception.span: 该方向不是 值之一。

span.span: The direction is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置面板控件中内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the contents within a panel control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的面板控件中内容的水平对齐方式。The property specifies the horizontal alignment of the contents within a panel control. 属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置水平对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is not set.| |`Left`|面板的内容是左对齐。The contents of the panel are left-aligned.| |`Center`|面板的内容居中。The contents of the panel are centered.| |`Right`|面板的内容为右对齐。The contents of the panel are right-aligned.| > [!NOTE] > .. 如果属性设置为但包含面板控件的控件中设置该属性，该设置继承自包含的控件。If the property is set to but the property is set in the control that contains the panel control, the setting is inherited from the containing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置两个面板控件的属性`Panel1`并`Panel2`到`HorizontalAlign.Center`枚举值。The following code example sets the properties of two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`, to the `HorizontalAlign.Center` enumeration value. 有关可用于运行该示例.aspx 文件，请参阅主题。For an .aspx file that can be used to run the example, see the topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

exception.span: 水平对齐方式不是 值之一。

span.span: The horizontal alignment is not one of the values.

span.span: Combines the style settings of the specified object with the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法来组合指定的样式设置对象的当前实例与类。You can use the method to combine the style settings of the specified object with the current instance of the class. 方法将从指定的非空白元素对象， `s`，但不会替换中的任何现有样式设置对象。The method copies non-blank elements from the specified object, `s`, but does not replace any existing style settings in the object. 若要替换中的样式设置对象中的样式设置`s`，使用方法。To replace the style settings in the object with the style settings in `s`, use the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置面板控件中滚动条的可见性和位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the visibility and position of scroll bars in a panel control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性面板控件中指定的可见性和滚动条的位置。The property specifies the visibility and position of scroll bars in a panel control. 属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|不显示任何滚动条。No scroll bars are shown.| |`Horizontal`|显示水平滚动条。Only a horizontal scroll bar is shown.| |`Vertical`|显示垂直滚动条。Only a vertical scroll bar is shown.| |`Both`|同时显示水平滚动条和垂直滚动条。Both horizontal and vertical scroll bars are shown.| |`Auto`|如有必要，水平、 垂直或这两个滚动条显示。If necessary, horizontal, vertical, or both scroll bars are shown. 要不然也可以不显示任何滚动条。Otherwise, no scroll bars are shown.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置两个面板控件的属性`Panel1`并`Panel2`到`ScrollBars.Both`枚举值。The following code example sets the properties of two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`, to the `ScrollBars.Both` enumeration value. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示面板中的内容是否换行的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content wraps within the panel.

value.span: 如果面板中的内容换行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the content wraps within the panel; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否在面板内的内容换行。The property indicates whether the content wraps within the panel. 当属性设置为`false`并属性设置为、 如果面板的内容的长度超过什么可放在面板中，在同一行中使用的水平滚动条会显示面板的内容。When the property is set to `false` and the property is set to , if the content of the panel is longer than what will fit in the panel, the content of the panel will appear on one line with a horizontal scroll bar. 当属性设置为`false`并属性设置为面板将进行扩展，如有必要 Web 页面将具有水平滚动条。When the property is set to `false` and the property is set to , the panel will extend and if necessary the Web page will have a horizontal scroll bar. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性设置为`false`的两个面板控件，`Panel1`和`Panel2`。The following code example sets the property to `false` for two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]
